mapper.select: select grp_id,col1,col2,col3,etc,bigo,to_char(regdt,'YYYYMMDD') AS regdt from test_low_data where rownum = 1 1
mapper.insert:
select TEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into test_low_data(seq,grp_id,col1,col2,col3,etc,bigo,regdt) values( #{seqColumn}, #{grp_id}, #{col1}, #{col2}, #{col3}, #{etc}, #{bigo}, sysdate )

select TEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into test_low_data(seq,grp_id,col1,col2,col3,etc,bigo,regdt) values( #{seqColumn}, #{grp_id}, #{col1}, #{col2}, #{col3}, #{etc}, #{bigo}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from test_low_data where to_char(regdt,'YYYYMM') like #{regdt}
